title: Java/MySQL Database App
description: Created a Java TUI app for posting and finding rental accommodations (Airbnb used as a template). Created a standalone MySQL server with custom functions, routines and triggers, and Java business logic with JDBC for receiving/processing input and issuing queries to the server

title: Sports And Games Social Platform
description: Developed a web application in an Agile team of 6 using React, Python, and SQLite. I Designed database schemas, developed many of the REST endpoints, and their associated frontend elements

title: My Resume Site
description: Created from Microsoft's template for a .NET (Blazor) Portfolio Site with GitHub Codespaces, used to showcase my learning of .NET as well as my past and future projects

title: Terminal Messaging App In C
description: Collaborated with a partner to develop a chat application using C. Implemented the client-side app and end-to-end message encryption through a server using RSA

title: Platformer Game Using MIPS Assembler
description: Created a platformer game with a resolution of 64 x 128 using MIPS assembler language. Required extensive knowledge of the MIPS CPU's architecture

title: Android Grocery Ordering App
description: Developed the app in a team of 5 using Java in Android Studio. Created the user UI for a storefront, ordering and shopping cart functionalities
